mapper.select: select pro_no as proNo, pro_title as proTitle, pro_progress as proProgress from project where pro_no=(select post_pro_no from post where post_no=#{postNo})

select post_no as postNo, post_title as postTitle, post_progress as postProgress, post_date as postDate, post_content as postContent, post_writer as postWriter, (select member_name from member where member_no=post_writer) as postWriterName, (select member_picture from member where member_no=post_writer) as postWriterPicture, post_temp as postTemp, post_pro_no as postProNo, post_Tag as postTag from post where post_no = #{postNo}

select todo_no as todoNo, todo_post_no as todoPostNo, todo_pro_no as todoProNo, todo_title as todoTitle, todo_content as todoContent, todo_writer as todoWriter, todo_member as todoMember, todo_start_date as todoStartDate, todo_end_date as todoEndDate, todo_progress as todoProgress, (select member_name from member where member_no=todo_writer) as todoWriterName, (select member_name from member where member_no=todo_member) as todoMemberName, (select member_picture from member where member_no=todo_member) as todoMemberPicture from todo where todo_post_no=#{postNo} order by todo_no desc
select member_no as memberNo, member_name as memberName from work_on join member using (member_no) where pro_no=(select post_pro_no from post where post_no=#{postNo}) and invite_yn='Y'
select sc_no as scheduleNo, member_no as memNO, sc_start_date as startDate, sc_end_date as endDate, sc_title as scTitle from schedule where post_no = #{postNo} order by sc_no desc
select upload_no as uploadNo, upload_date as uploadDate, upload_subject as uploadSubject, upload_name as fileName, upload_path as uploadPath from upload where post_no=#{postNo}

select dc_no as dcNo, dc_writer as dcWriter, dc_maker as dcMaker, dc_content as dcContent, dc_yn as dcYn, dc_decision as dcDecision, dc_comment as dcComment, (select member_name from member where member_no=dc_writer) as dcWriterName, (select member_name from member where member_no=dc_maker) as dcMakerName from decision where dc_Post_No=#{postNo} order by dc_no desc

select dc_no as dcNo, dc_writer as dcWriter, dc_maker as dcMaker, dc_content as dcContent, dc_yn as dcYn, dc_decision as dcDecision, dc_comment as dcComment, (select member_name from member where member_no=dc_writer) as dcWriterName, (select member_name from member where member_no=dc_maker) as dcMakerName from decision where dc_no = #{dcNo}
select rp_no as rpNo, post_no as postNo, project_no as projectNo from related_post where post_no=#{postNo}
select post_no as postNo, member_no as memberNo from bookmark where post_no=#{postNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into todo values(todo_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{todoPostNo},(select post_pro_no from post where post_no=#{todoPostNo}),#{todoTitle},#{todoContent},#{todoWriter},#{todoMember},SYSDATE,SYSDATE,'suggest')
mapper.select: select member_name as memberName, member_picture as memberPicture from member where member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.update: update post set post_title =#{postTitle}, post_content =#{postContent} where post_no=#{postNo}
update post set post_progress=#{postProgress} where post_no=#{postNo}
update todo set todo_progress=#{todoProgress} where todo_no=#{todoNo}
mapper.delete: delete bookmark where post_no=#{postNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
mapper.select: select m.member_name as writeNick, m.member_no as writerNo, m.member_picture as writePicture, to_char(cm_date,'yy-mm-dd am hh24:mi:ss')as writeTime , ct.cm_tag as content, ct.CM_POST as postNo, ct.cmember_no as commentNo from comment_tbl ct join member m on (ct.cm_writer = m.member_no) where cm_post = #{postNo} order by writeTime
select post_no as postNo, member_no as memberNo from post_like where post_no=#{postNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
select count(*) from post_like where post_no=#{postNo}
mapper.delete: delete from post_like where post_no=#{postNo} and member_no=#{memberNo}
